attributes.action: consider rewarding environmentally conscious drivers rather than punishing all drivers by introducing further "taxes" by way of road-charging etc.
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background:
Recent publicity has been focussed on the issue of road pricing. Why does the government not focus on rewarding those of us who limit our journeys by car rather than punish those who use their cars more? 
Improved public transport, financial rewards for those who car pool, further reductions in vehicle tax for "small" or eco-friendly vehicles. Give us more carrots and less sticks!
